page.title: 13SCHOOL LIFE-2
page.content: We{read books}and{extract information from them. We enjoy doing{art}and {craft}because we can choose which {materials}and{colours.}We use {paint,glue,boxes,felt tip pens, {crayons,chalk}different kinds of {paper,cloth and wool. Physical {Education}is{learning skills}to keep our{bodies}in good{condition.}We have {special equipment}like{ropes,climbing {frames,benches, metal trestles.}In {games}we practice{football,netball and{rounders}and choose teams to play against other schools. We somtimes play games on the{computer}when it is our class's turn. School begins at {9 0'clock}and a{register}is called. The school day ends at{quarter to 4. Some of us have{school dinners}which are cooked on the premises.They cost us{45p each}and they are very good.
